summary: A small-time project created to bring compatibility to modules created by the community , whilst including some vanilla renaming myself. Works with all Better Sorting modules.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/MhrmllD.png[/img][/center]

This is the first mod I\'ve ever released - The files contained have been rigorously tested and work just fine, however I might be prone to oversights. Let me know!

There\'s not really much to it - Here lies the continued efforts to support modules created by the community, whilst fixing a few naming regimes in the base DLC\'s that others have taken oversight to. See the screenshots for the changes - Full changes are listed in the changelog for this version.

-----
[color=lawngreen][b]Installation[/b][/color]
-----
[list=1]
[*]Grab [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26558]Enhanced Better Sorting[/url] if you haven\'t already, else this mod will look a little out of place.
[*]Download the enclosed mod with [b]Nexus Mod Manager[/b].
[*]Double-click to install.
[*]Select the plugins you\'d like to install.
[/list]

If you\'re having issues seeing the mod take effect in-game, please make sure my plugins load at the END of your load order.

-----
[color=red][b]Uninstallation[/b][/color]
-----

Deactivate with the mod manager, or remove the files manually from your Data directory.

------------------------------
Please note that each plugin has a built-in dependency list. If you don\'t have a required dependency installed (for example, Immersive Weapons.esp), the installer will inform you.

[b]Currently supports Immersive Weapons\' arrows, and a rename to a few of Hearthfire\'s weapons.[/b]

[size=1]Have a mod that you\'d like your items made compatible with the slew of Better Sorting mods out there? Let me know.[/size]

DBSP - Immersive Weapons.esp (Immersive Weapons compatibility)
-----------------------------------------
Fixed the following arrowtypes to be displayed in accordance with Better Sorting:
- Dariit Arrow > Arrow - Dariit
- Seeker Arrow > Arrow - Seeker
- Justiciar Arrow > Arrow - Justiciar
- Dragonsteel Arrow > Arrow - Dragonsteel
- Exotic Arrow > Arrow - Exotic
- An-Xileel Arrow > Arrow - An-Xileel

DBSP - Hearthfire.esp (Immersive Weapons compatibility)
-----------------------------------------
Fixed the following building materials to be more suited towards Better Sorting's categories:
- Sawn Log > Material - Sawn Log
- Nails > Material - Nails
- Hinge > Material - Hinge
- Lock > Material - Lock
- Iron Fittings > Material - Iron Fittings
- Goat Horns > Material - Goat Horns
- Clay > Material - Clay
- Quarried Stone > Material - Stone
- Straw > Material - Straw
- Glass > Material - Glass
